configurations.name: configuration.ini
configurations.content:
[main]
outfolder: output
datakb: data.rule
defaultdatafactory: DummyDataFactory
imagekb: image.rule
defaultimagefactory: DummyImageFactory
fromdate: 1/1/1980
todate: 31/12/2020

[image]
longitude: 40.493
latitude: 40.493
area: 100
imageresolution: 100
format: jpg
imagetimeinterval: 10

[data]
data: temperature,humidity
datatimeinterval: 10
